Kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite counters & breakfast bar. Bonus den off living room great for extra living space or office! Master suite with walk-in closet, access to terrace and marble bath with double vanity, soaking tub & separate shower. In-unit washer/dryer. 2 CAR tandem garage parking $35k. Building has doorstaff, exercise room, dog run, storage and bike storage. Assessments include Comcast cable & internet. Located just steps to some of the best dining experiences Chicago has to offer, plus shopping and pub trans! Easy access to expressway too!

response.homeDescription:
Fantastic 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo with aprox. 1450 sq ft to call your own! Features Sears/Willis tower views, North, South, and East sunshine from expansive thermalpane windows, wood burning/gas start fireplace with granite surround, kitchen features a 13 foot granite bar open to LR/DR, newer stainless appliances and 42" maple cabinets, beautiful newly refinished oak floors throughout, new furnace/ac and new in-unit washer and dryer (to be installed next week). Ceiling fans, custom fixtures, security system, large private storage room, even a built-in mount for your Weber grill! Master suite has private balcony, marble bath with dual sinks, multiple showerheads and jacuzzi tub. Small 6 unit building has gorgeous landscaping/green space in front and back! Parking is easy and one garage space is included, Starbucks, fabulous Taylor street restaurants, several parks and public transit all within a 2 min walk.
This is one you have to see to believe!
Tenant responsible for gas and electric. Credit and background check, references required. This is a non-smoking home.

Spectacular lake and city views, totally upgraded, rarely available, highly desirable “01” unit. Balcony. Marble and wood throughout, granite counters and stainless steel appliances. 6 jet shower and master bath. 24 hour doorman, pool, workout room, on-site management. Highly convenient public transportation.

Condo Unit Info/Amenities: - 4 bedrooms - 3 Full Bathroom - Washer and dryer in the unit! - Hardwood floors throughout the upstairs living room and 2 bedrooms. The downstairs is carpet throughout the family room and 2 bedrooms. - Plenty of Storage and closet space - Appliances included (refrigerator, stove, oven and microwave) - Freshly painted walls - Windows in every room making it very bright and sunny if need be - Central Air! - Great heating and air conditioning system.
Surrounding Neighborhood Info: - Great school district with both the grade school and high school within a half mile away. - Public transportation (train and bus stops) only a block away and within walking distance - Easy access and short drive to the expressway - Great restaurants and stores within walking distance (grocery store across the street)
Move-In and Rent Info: - Rent is $2300 a month with a one year minimum lease term - No security deposit required!! - A $400 non refundable move-in fee - Credit check and background checks will be conducted for each tenant. - Pets under 40 pounds are allowed.
Tenant Eligibility Requirements: - No felonies - No evictions - Credit score of at least 550 - Combined monthly income for all tenants must be $6000 or greater - $35 application fee per applicant/tenant

editedFacts.appliances: Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator, Washer, Dishwasher, Freezer

response.homeDescription:
We're relocating for a job, and sadly have to part ways with our lovely condo. We've truly appreciated living here, and know you will too! Located in East Lakeview (between Sheffield and Halstead), just a few blocks from the Addison Red Line, and convenient to Lakeshore Drive/Halsted buses, which makes commuting anywhere a breeze.
The details: 1bd/1ba, 950 SQ FT Unfurnished Short Term (5month) or Long Term(12 month) lease Top floor unit (3rd floor) Large, open layout living space with a reading/office nook High Ceilings! In-unit Washer & Dryer Rear Deck Large bedroom (fits King or Queen easily) Large Walk-In closet Dishwasher Central A/C & Heat (new furnace installed spring 2017) Fireplace (we never used, but told it works) Extra Storage Unit (8X10) in basement Bike Racks, additional shared laundry also in basement. Permitted Street Parking available
Looking to sublet the remainder of our lease, 5 months October 1st- end of February (Option to sign a new lease now or in Feb) Rent is $1850, and utilities have averaged 60-70 per month. No deposit, but you'd have to submit an application through our landlord, which we'd help coordinate. I believe a small pet would be allowed, but also not our call.
Quiet Building, independently owned units = people who care about their surroundings, but mind their own business:) Access to Lake! 10-15 minute walk to Belmont Harbor Whole Foods 2 blocks up Halstead. Mariano's 1/2 mile down Broadway. Transportation-We're a couple that share a car, but hardly ever use it. 2 block walk to Addison beats parking anywhere near downtown. Endless supply of bars and restaurants within walking or $5 uber distance, whatever your scene may be. Safe-never felt uneasy walking around this neighborhood, and Lakeview in general. Responsive, local owners- we only had to contact once for a sink clog, and they were on it. 2 blocks to Wrigley Field, if that's your thing. If not, the crowds on gamedays aren't as big of a deal as I imagined.
Happy to show most days/eves!
Owner pays for sewer, water, trash. Tenant pays for electric.

Attractive brick row house with vintage features on tree lined residential block in Roscoe Village. Originally a single family home it was converted to two units in 1908 by building a two story addition on the back. First floor duplex has two bedrooms/two baths. Top floor has two bedrooms/one bath. Building has: newer custom windows (Marvin and Andersen), recent tuck pointing, new siding on addition, flood control system and other improvements. Further updating would increase rents. Or, convert to single family. Garage could be built in back. Tenant is looking for a home and may request a lease that ends May 31, 2017.
